turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. Hi, I wanted to make an order to Bella Luna Pizzeria.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what did you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I wanted to get four small pizzas, and let me know when you're ready for the toppings I want on each.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. I want one pepperoni, and then I want one Greek lover's, and then I want one with sausage and onion. And for the last one, make it barbecue chicken.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome, did u have a crust preference?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I want thick crust for all four of those.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so you said 4 small pizzas, 1 pepperoni, 1 greek lovers, 1 sausage and onion, 1 bbq chicken, all with thick crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did i get that down correctly?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $56 is the total. Do you want me to place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, go ahead and place the order now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've submitted your order. it should be ready for pick up in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I think that's it today. Thank you very much.
